mapper.select: select p.pname as name, r.content as content, r.star as star, r.birth as birth from review r, patient p where r.comnum=#{comnum} AND r.pidnum=p.pidnum

SELECT h.hname as name , res.resdate as date , h.department as department , r.star as star , r.content as content FROM patient p , review r , hospital h , reservation res WHERE 1=1 AND r.pidnum = #{pidnum} AND r.comnum = h.comnum AND res.pidnum = #{pidnum} AND h.comnum = res.comnum ORDER BY res.resdate desc

select p.pname as name, r.content as content, r.star as star, r.birth as birth from review r JOIN patient p on r.pidnum=p.pidnum where r.comnum=#{comnum} AND r.birth = (SELECT MAX(birth) from review r JOIN patient p on r.pidnum=p.pidnum where r.comnum=#{comnum})
